activities: NGC provides loyalty and incentive marketing fulfillment services to gift card providers and companies sponsoring customer and/or employee rewards programs.  NGC's business customers use NGC and its affiliates' services to administer their customer loyalty and rewards programs/schemes.  Program users/members' data including names, physical mailing and electronic addresses, and other data is hosted on dedicated Tier-4 Rackspace data centers located in the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer loyalty and incentive program data including name, physical mailing and e-mail address, program log-in credentials, job title, and telephone numbers
recoursemech: United States Council for International Business-Safe-Harbor-EU DPA, 1212 Avenue of the Americas, 21st Floor, New York, NY  10036
